title: Vikram Vedha first look: R Madhavan, Vijay Sethupathi set of an iconic clash | regional movies | Hindustan Times
text:
Desimartini Vikram Vedha first look: R Madhavan, Vijay Sethupathi set of an iconic clash 
The first look poster of R Madhavan’s Tamil film, Vikram Vedha, which also stars Vijay Sethupathi, was revealed on Wednesday. A black-and-white shot, the poster has the faces of the two stars in a salt-and-pepper make-up, looking in opposite directions. regional movies Updated: Feb 22, 2017 13:02 IST Hindustan Times, New Delhi Vikram Vedha stars R Madhavan and Vijay Sethupathi. 
The first look poster of R Madhavan’s Tamil film, Vikram Vedha, which also stars Vijay Sethupathi, was unveiled on Wednesday. A black-and-white monochrome shot, the poster has the faces of the two stars in a salt-and-pepper make-up, looking in different directions. Read more Kamal Haasan exhorts fellow actor R Madhavan to speak on Tamil Nadu crisis 
Vikram Vedha is reportedly based on the mythological tale, Vikramaditya. The lean look of Madhavan has been the talk of the town, particularly since he had really bulked up for his last Tamil film, Irudhi Suttru (2015). The actor had earlier said that for Vikram Vedha he managed to get his lean look without hitting the gym or any other kind of workout. He plays an encounter specialist. — Ramesh Bala (@rameshlaus) February 22, 2017 
“I’m glad that I’ve managed to achieve this look without any workout and just followed my own secret diet which got me such fantastic result. I do not eat after 6 pm and ensure to keep at least five-and-half-hour gap between two meals,” Madhavan said in a statement. 
Directed by Pushkar-Gayathri, Vikram Vedha is a crime thriller also featuring Shraddha Srinath, Kathir, John Vijay and Varu Sarath. 
Follow @htshowbiz for more
